name: Pup Seeker
description:
Description:

Doggone it! Your dog is gone! Your goal is to find it! 

This was a game made for Tojam 2022. We hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Movement - W/A/S/D + Arrow Keys + Space (Jump)

UI Buttons - Mouse

Credits:

LRD - Code/Design

KPD - Code/Art

Dave S. - Music/SFX
